alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Madison; Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 03 at 4:54PM EDT until May 03 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT FOR FRANKLIN...NORTHERN PICKAWAY AND SOUTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 454 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Grove City, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Reynoldsburg, Grove City, Upper Arlington, Gahanna, Bexley, Canal Winchester, Groveport, Ashville, Mount Sterling, South Bloomfield, Ohio State University, Easton, Lake Darby, Whitehall, New Albany, Grandview Heights, Obetz, Commercial Point and Lithopolis. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 93 and 111. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 82 and 113. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
